primary_sources.name: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)
primary_sources.description: UN agency responsible for coordinating humanitarian response. Provides regular reports on casualties and humanitarian situation in Palestine.

primary_sources.name: Human Rights Watch
primary_sources.description: International human rights organization that investigates and reports on violations of international humanitarian law and human rights.

primary_sources.name: B'Tselem - The Israeli Information Center for Human Rights in the Occupied Territories
primary_sources.description: Israeli human rights organization documenting human rights violations in the occupied Palestinian territories.

primary_sources.name: Amnesty International
primary_sources.description: Global movement for human rights. Conducts investigations and advocacy on human rights violations worldwide.

primary_sources.name: Euro-Mediterranean Human Rights Monitor
primary_sources.description: Independent organization that monitors and documents human rights violations in the Euro-Mediterranean region.

primary_sources.name: UN Commission of Inquiry on the Occupied Palestinian Territory
primary_sources.description: UN Human Rights Council investigative body examining violations of international law in Palestine.

primary_sources.name: World Health Organization
primary_sources.description: UN agency responsible for international public health. Documents attacks on healthcare and health impacts.

primary_sources.name: United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees
primary_sources.description: UN agency providing assistance and protection to Palestinian refugees. Documents attacks on its facilities.

primary_sources.name: Palestinian Centre for Human Rights
primary_sources.description: Palestinian human rights organization based in Gaza. Provides detailed documentation of violations.

primary_sources.name: Al-Haq
primary_sources.description: Palestinian human rights organization focused on legal advocacy and documentation.

verification_levels.verified: Confirmed by multiple credible sources with evidence
verification_levels.under_investigation: Single source or insufficient evidence pending further investigation

casualty_counting.death_toll_priority: Official health ministry figures cross-referenced with international organizations

incident_documentation.update_frequency: Real-time for current events, periodic review for historical
